overview: If you get into a wreck or you want your hole to get wrecked, you are in the right place at Rocco Steele's Dad's Bareback Collision Shop. Our daddies will be sure these thirsty bottoms leave the shop with their cars looking like new...and their holes in much worse shape than when they came in. So buckle-up for a 100% greasy bareback adventure.
title: Dad's Bareback Collision Shop
